title: Robb Report's Colvin on the 28th 'Best of the Best' List(Audio)
itunes:title: Robb Report's Colvin on the 28th 'Best of the Best' List(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Stephen Colvin, CEO of the Robb Report, on building their global brand, and highlights from their 28th annual list of "Best of the Best' award winners.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
